topic.title: Dont use Intel ME or Management Engine
topic.body: If you use these new Management engine chips you'll lose all control of your computer because it runs its own os in the backround that you cant control meaning anyone of the corps can peek inside your machine.....

topic.title: Moors law is about to end 2020 is next year! ReadHere.
topic.body: Moors law is about to end, 2020 is next year and companies around the world are spending billions and billions of dollars to dominate what the future of our chips will be.. they are buying other companies so that they have the upper hand.... let this not happen, Intel ME is going to add artificial intelligence as a background separate OS, the problem is that it isn't the most secure Being that A you cant turn it off as in the chip, as it is always on, and B..  2 security loopholes have already been found.. this is not old I repeat not old news this moment is going to determine the future direction of the internet and the computer revolution. Quantum Computation, 3d Stacked Chips, The long skepticized Dna data storage, Morphological Computation, Photon based chips, and more... This is very important, we must take the control of crypto away from the big banks and corps... and we must decentralize all of the internet or it may not look bright going forward. Spread this word... & Good Luck to Mans future.
